org.xbib.elasticsearch.river.jdbc.support

Class RiverContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbib.elasticsearch.river.jdbc.support.RiverContext

  • public class RiverContext
extends Object
    The river context consists of the parameters that span over source and target, and the source and target. It represents the river state, for supporting the river task, and river scripting.
    Author:
    JÃ¶rg Prante
